response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its value to be well above $800,000. However, to facilitate a fair negotiation process, I am offering this exceptional opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. This offer includes comprehensive support and customization options tailored to meet your specific needs. We are confident that this investment will yield substantial returns for you. Please let us know if you require any further information or would like to discuss this offer in more detail.", "product_price": 750000}
